multiplechoiceresponse.label: What is the difference between a class and an object?
multiplechoiceresponse.description: You can add an optional tip or note related to the prompt like this.

choicegroup.choice: A class is a template for creating objects, while an object is an instance of a class
An object is a template for creating classes, while a class is an instance of an object
A class and an object are the same thing
